text:
Contracts for surveying and
mapping services for transmission lines, highways, dams, etc., are subject to
the SCA, even if they are preliminary to construction. Such contracts would not
be subject to the SCA if they are directly related to construction (instead,
they would be DBA covered). (See 29 C.F.R. 4.130(a)(46).)
html: Contracts for surveying and mapping services for transmission lines, highways, dams, etc., are subject to the SCA, even if they are preliminary to construction. Such contracts would not be subject to the SCA if they are directly related to construction (instead, they would be DBA covered). (See 29 C.F.R. 4.130(a)(46).)
